sentences.sentence: He immediately threw a tantrum, screaming and stomping up and down like a child.
sentences.translation: 他立刻发起脾气来，尖叫着，像孩子似的来回跺脚。

sentences.sentence: One of the biggest cases occurred in February 2006 when an anonymous video surfaced of a woman in high heels stomping a cat to death.
sentences.translation: 最大的案件之一是2006年2月一段匿名录像出现在网上，一位妇女脚穿高跟鞋狠狠的将猫踩死。

sentences.sentence: Hygienic macros can be safely used anywhere without fear of stomping on existing variable names.
sentences.translation: 健康的宏可以安全地在任何地方使用，不必担心与现有的变量名冲突。
